title: Facebook sparks new outrage by tracking non users
text:
Facebook sparks new outrage by tracking non users Sunday, April 15, 2018 - 01:55 
Concern about Facebook's respect for data privacy is widening to include the information that it collects about non-users, after Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg said the social network tracks people whether they have accounts or not. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Concern about Facebook's respect for data privacy is widening to include the information that it collects about non-users, after Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg said the social network tracks people whether they have accounts or not.
